plot: A documentary about the French exile of Turkish filmmaker Yilmaz Güney, and how he directed "The Wall" in a French old abbey.
title: Autour du mur
plot_es: A documentary about the French exile of Turkish filmmaker Yilmaz Güney, and how he directed "The Wall" in a French old abbey.
plot_en: A documentary about the French exile of Turkish filmmaker Yilmaz Güney, and how he directed "The Wall" in a French old abbey.
